explains: n. 依靠，信任；<古>被依赖的人（或物）
wordGroup: self reliance 自力更生；依靠自已
reliance industries 印度瑞来斯实业公司（又称信实工业公司）

sentences.en: People learned self-reliance because they had to.
sentences.cn: 人们学会了自立因为他们不得不这样做。

sentences.en: Heavy reliance on one client is risky when you are building up a business.
sentences.cn: 创业时过分依赖某一个客户是有风险的。

sentences.en: About 10% of Japanese teenagers are overweight. Nutritionists say the main culprit is increasing reliance on Western fast food.
sentences.cn: 约10%的日本青少年都超重。营养学家们称主要的原因是他们越来越依赖西方快餐。
